snippet: Leonard Grant, a.k.a. Uncle Murda, chronicled his life as a Brooklyn rap performer as a colleague, Ronald Herron, known as Ra Diggs, stands trial for three killings.
abstract: Leonard Grant, known by his rap name Uncle Murda, testifies in murder and racketeering trial of Ronald Herron in Federal District Court in Brooklyn; defense is arguing that Herron, rapper also known as Ra Diggs, boasts about guns and drugs in his music in merely fictional context.
lead_paragraph: Leonard Grant, a.k.a. Uncle Murda, chronicled his life as a Brooklyn rap performer as a colleague, Ronald Herron, known as Ra Diggs, stands trial for three killings.

headline.seo: Uncle Murda Testifies for Defense in Ra Diggs’s Trial
headline.main: Rappers’ Lyrics and Lifestyles Scrutinized in Murder Case
headline.print_headline: Interplay Between Rappers’ Lyrics and Lifestyles Is Scrutinized in a Brooklyn Murder Case
